title: vanitydude
author: vanitydude
created_time: January 17, 2023, 04:25:22 AMLast edit: December 26, 2023, 12:49:44 AM by vanitydude
content: Hello,I am hiring a professional developer to create a Solana vanity address generator, here are some basic details;1) runs on Linux2) compatible with multiple (in parallel) Nvidia GPUS, using CUDA/OpenCLThere is a project on Github to give you an idea of what i'm looking for (However it's only for EVM addresses )https://github.com/1inch/profanity2Solana keygen grind is also acceptable if you're able to tweak it to work with GPU'sDo contact me via PM for much more details on my requirements, only experienced people please!

comments.author: TimtheYoutuber
comments.body: I sent you a dm and would be glad to do this for you.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: gred1982 on January 21, 2023, 02:50:01 AMSent a DM. This user entered into an agreement to do this development and once funds were sent to escrow they decided to back out and not do the work.  This is resulting in a refund request for the buyer (OP) which I am going to process later today.  I wanted to post here in the event that a possible man in the middle scam could be occurring in the event that it can possibly help someone from having their funds stolen.  I hope this is enough of a warning as this is a fairly common scheme that tends to result in users trusting telegram accounts impersonating someone else and then losing their money by sending it to an escrow agent who has been communicating with alt accounts.

comments.author: vanitydude
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on February 03, 2023, 06:12:14 PMQuote from: gred1982 on January 21, 2023, 02:50:01 AMSent a DM. This user entered into an agreement to do this development and once funds were sent to escrow they decided to back out and not do the work.  This is resulting in a refund request for the buyer (OP) which I am going to process later today.  I wanted to post here in the event that a possible man in the middle scam could be occurring in the event that it can possibly help someone from having their funds stolen.  I hope this is enough of a warning as this is a fairly common scheme that tends to result in users trusting telegram accounts impersonating someone else and then losing their money by sending it to an escrow agent who has been communicating with alt accounts.Refund received, thanks.I am still looking for a skilled developer to complete this project , but don't bother reaching out if you're planning on wasting everyone's time with the all-too-common "disappearing act".

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: -Implement private key generation: Implement a private key generation algorithm that is compatible with CUDA/OpenCL and can run in parallel on multiple GPUs.-Implement a function to derive the corresponding Solana address from each private key.-Implement a function to check if each generated address matches the desired vanity pattern.-Parallelize the address generation and checking process to run on multiple GPUs.-When a matching address is found, store the corresponding private key securely.Added some clarity to your description, so people will understand moreLooks easy now.Ps:Note: Keep in mind that the private key must be stored securely to ensure the safety of any funds associated with the address. It is also recommended to use a reputable cryptography library to generate private keys and perform other cryptographic operations.Btw, as Newbie member i can't sent DM's to you.

comments.author: vanitydude
comments.body: Quote from: aliveNFT on February 04, 2023, 11:45:04 PM-Implement private key generation: Implement a private key generation algorithm that is compatible with CUDA/OpenCL and can run in parallel on multiple GPUs.-Implement a function to derive the corresponding Solana address from each private key.-Implement a function to check if each generated address matches the desired vanity pattern.-Parallelize the address generation and checking process to run on multiple GPUs.-When a matching address is found, store the corresponding private key securely.Added some clarity to your description, so people will understand moreLooks easy now.Ps:Note: Keep in mind that the private key must be stored securely to ensure the safety of any funds associated with the address. It is also recommended to use a reputable cryptography library to generate private keys and perform other cryptographic operations.Btw, as Newbie member i can't sent DM's to you.Thanks for the clarification, i have more details to provide to interested parties via DM....Btw, i had always enabled newbies to send DM's to me.

Therefore, you cannot send PMs to newbies, either.sent me a details via telegram @e

comments.author: vanitydude
comments.body: Still looking for this, increasing budget to $2000.  Professionals only, ChatGPT time wasting frauds need not apply.

comments.author: alexeyneu
comments.body: i can do smth on this. i have amd card so opencl only. 75 bucks in solana upfront

comments.author: chaos_stotch
comments.body: Hi Vanitydude!I'm a developer and I have great experience creating automation tools. I can create your solana address generator cleanly and efficiently.Check out my work history at UpWork:https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/~0181cd3365c713ebfdmy github:https://github.com/chaos-stotchI've already made something similar to generate bitcoin addresses, so I have the base to do the job.I am at your disposal.Best Regards,Vitor Oliveira

comments.author: Loripendragon
comments.body: I looking for hiring someone for a similar project !

comments.author: vanitydude
comments.body: Bumping reward up to $2500.  Professionals only.

comments.author: albert0bsd
comments.body: Do you have some kind of deadline or are you going to accept the approximate time that the developer tell you?In the second case i can try to develop it, recently i am learning cuda to implement in my keyhunt project, but it can easily be tweak for yor purpose.My keyhunt project in case that you don't know it: https://github.com/albertobsd/keyhunt#vanity-searchRegards!

comments.author: yoyghet+9k
comments.body: Quote from: vanitydude on December 26, 2023, 02:12:18 AMUpgrading reward to 3500$If you are still hiring, I got this working some time ago. The implementation works according to your specs (Linux+GPU+NVIDIA CUDA). We can either:provide the source code for 10kprovide a compiled binary for 5kgenerate the each of the addresses you need for a fee (not sure how much it would be, but we'll have to calculate it on prefix length, estimated computing time and real computing time)Unfortunately, this was done for private use and the code base is pretty rudimentary, I would need to work it out a bit to deliver it without lots of hacks. Probably a weekend or two of work.
